sources.title: Forgotten Tune for the Flute
sources.description:
In the past, Filimonov was a talented, promising musician. The present is prosaic - he is the son-in-law of a “big man”, and nothing more. Once Filimonov had a heart attack - and this at less than forty years old! This unpleasant incident was the reason for meeting the wonderful nurse Lida. And a whirlwind romance began... But finding the courage and strength to radically change your established life is always difficult.

Year of production: 1987

Director: Ryazanov Eldar
Writers: Eldar Ryazanov, Emil Braginsky
Composer: Petrov Andrey
Operator: Alisov Vadim
Production designer: Borisov Alexander

Cast: Elena Mayorova, Petr Merkuryev, Valentin Gaft, Olga Volkova, Tatyana Dogileva, Alexander Shirvindt, Alexander Pankratov-Cherny, Tatyana Agafonova, Vsevolod Sanaev, Irina Kupchenko, Leonid Filatov, Nina Agapova, Vaclav Dvorzhetsky, Elena Fadeeva, Tatyana Novitskaya, Artsibashev Sergey, Antonova Elena, Voskresensky Evgeniy

metadata.Plot: A flutist in the forgotten past, at present the husband of a "big man's" daughter and head of one of the Chief Directorate's sections felt unwell one day: the forty-year-old man had a pain in his heart. This unpleasant incident provided an opportunity to meet a nurse named Lida. However, their stormy love affair ended, with Filimonov returning to normal life and an unloved wife.
metadata.Actors: Leonid Filatov, Tatyana Dogileva, Irina Kupchenko
